CheckTitle: Ensure Guest User Invitations Setting is Sufficiently Restrictive
Description: Checks if the Guest User Invitations setting (AllowInvitesFrom) is set to a sufficiently restrictive value in the tenant.
Risk: If the Guest User Invitations setting is not restrictive enough, unauthorized users may be able to invite guests, increasing risk.

Code.Other: 1. Go to Azure Portal (https://portal.azure.com). 2. Navigate to Azure Active Directory > External Identities > External collaboration settings. 3. Set Guest user invitations to the most restrictive option.

Recommendation.Text: Set the Guest User Invitations setting to a most restrictive value to limit who can invite guests.

Notes: This check validates that the Guest User Invitations setting is set to a sufficiently restrictive value in the tenant.
